name: GAMAFORCE UGM
location: Kompleks UGM, Jl. Podocarpus II, Blok D No. 13, Kabupaten Sleman, Yogyakarta, Indonesia
description: Contributed to the Khageswara Ground Control Station (GCS) subteam at GAMAFORCE UGM, a flying robot team focused on aerospace technology and UAV development, by developing GCS applications.
achievements: Collaborated with the team to achieve first place in Kontes Robot Terbang Indonesia 2024 (Technology Development Division)

name: Association of Software Engineering Technology Students UGM
description: Served as Public Relations and Publication Staff at ASSETS UGM, managing communication and social media content to promote the organization's activities and engage with the public.
achievements: Created and disseminated social media content to increase organization visibility
Managed social media platforms, improving engagement through effective copywriting
Collaborated with team members to support organizational events and initiatives

name: Google Developer Student Clubs UGM
description: Actively participated in Google Developer Student Clubs (GDSC) UGM, contributing to the development of BIN-GO!, a mobile app addressing the waste crisis in Yogyakarta through Google Maps integration and waste management features.
achievements: Developed the Bin-Locator map feature for BIN-GO! using Google Maps API and Firebase
Collaborated on debugging and optimizing the BIN-GO! app for enhanced user experience
Contributed to the Global Top 100 GDSC Solution Challenge 2024 with BIN-GO!
